content: any feltable yarn can be used for the curly dahlia - for the greenery i crochet over 28 gauge jewellery wire - fascinator base was covered with a hand-felted patch - flower greenery & beads were then attached to felt-covered base - created in honour of melbourne cup day 2008 - down under land… it has been brought to my attention that there is an error in the pattern - row 1 should read * make 18 chain row 1 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook double_crochet us single_crochet in next chain half_double_crochet us half_double_crochet in next chain treble_crochet us double_crochet in next 4 chain dtr us treble_crochet in next 5 chain treble_crochet us double_crochet in next 2 chain half_double_crochet us half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet us single_crochet in next chain slip_stitch in last chain repeat from * 11 times more finish off leaving a long tail 12 petals - wind petals into flower shape & sew securely in place
